definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Im going to put needles into certain points on your body.
sentences.chinese: 我把針扎到您身上的穴位中去。

sentences.english: Its quantity of heat and the far-infrared can rapidly penetrate the skin points deep place.
sentences.chinese: 其熱量和遠紅外線能迅速穿透皮膚穴位深處。

sentences.english: Don't you feel to be swabbed everyday " acupuncture point " very troublesome?
sentences.chinese: 你不覺得天天擦洗“穴位”很麻煩嗎？

sentences.english: The magnetic line can be extended to the channels and collaterals acupoints of people's vola.
sentences.chinese: 更將磁力線延伸到人們足底的經絡穴位。

sentences.english: Method The main methods are Point Massage Motorpathy(PMM) and patterning.
sentences.chinese: 方法主要有穴位按摩運動療法及模式。

sentences.english: To the compound anisodine injection as the control group.
sentences.chinese: 以單純複方樟柳鹼穴位注射治療作爲對照組。

sentences.english: This paper reports acupuncture and point injection therapy for lumbago.
sentences.chinese: 本文報導了針刺配穴位注射治療腰腿痛的療法。

sentences.english: In addition, some insurance companies begin to accept acupressure.
sentences.chinese: 另外，部分保險公司也逐漸接受穴位按壓。

sentences.english: Gain a new weapon against motion sickness from this free video on basic acupressure techniques.
sentences.chinese: 對暈車增益從這個免費視頻的新武器技術的基本穴位。

sentences.english: Fight a kidney deficiency through acupressure in this free video by a licensed massage therapist.
sentences.chinese: 撲滅由持牌按摩治療師在此免費視頻通過穴位腎虛。

sentences.english: A moxa cone placed directly on the point and ignited is called direct moxibustion.
sentences.chinese: 是將艾炷直接放在穴位皮膚上施灸的一種方法。

sentences.english: Needles need to go into specific points in the body.
sentences.chinese: 針必須紮在身體的一些特定穴位上。

sentences.english: We have studied on preventing and treating anaphylactic asthma with Zusanli(S36)point immunotherapy(ZPIT).
sentences.chinese: 用足三裏穴位免疫療法對過敏性哮喘進行防治研究。

sentences.english: Finish daily feet, still can do massage ofbuttocks acupoint.
sentences.chinese: 每天泡完腳以後，還可做穴位按摩。

sentences.english: The electric characteristics of acupoints have been confirmed by researchers at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 穴位的電特性已經爲國內外科研工作者所證實。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the mechanism of catgut implantation at acupoint on obesity rat.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討穴位埋線方法對肥胖大鼠減肥的作用機制。

definition: acupuncture point (any point on any meridian)/category of 12 specific acupuncture points near the wrist or ankle, each lying on a different meridian (one of five categories collectively termed 五輸穴|五输穴)
Quchi acupoint LI11, at the lateral end of the elbow crease
form of therapeutic massage, mainly for children, in which a roll of skin is squeezed, working from the base of the spine to the neck (TCM)
fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin)/ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)
to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)
